resources.string: X-STREAM is a Audio/Video streaming player application. It supports ANDROID 2.2 version and versions higher than that. It provides the user an access to a large collection of Audio and Video media that are streamed in online (via GPRS/WIFI).

X-STREAM provides user access to both Audio and Video streaming media. 


**AUDIO STREAM** 


To access Audio the user can navigate to the Audio page (Home/Audio Stream). The channels are listed on the right hand margin. The list can be dragged in/out. Click on the channels listed to change the channel. User can create his own channels and add his favorite songs to it by clicking on the "+" button present beside the progress bar at the right bottom of the screen. 


**VIDEO STREAM**


To access Video the user can navigate to the Video page (Home/Video Stream). The channels are listed on the right hand margin. The list can be dragged in/out. Click on the channels listed to change the channel. In the Video page the list present at the bottom of the screen can be swiped to view the next/previous item. To play a Video click on the PLAY button of the current Video item present at the center of the screen.User can create his own channels and add his favorite songs to it by clicking on the "+" button present at the right bottom of the current Video item.


**MULTIPLE STREAMS FROM HOME SCREEN**


The home screen provides a list of auto panning Audio/Video categories. To access the displayed media, press the PLAY button present on the media item. The auto panning range of categories on the home screen can be swiped in/out to view the next/previous media items.
